attributes.action: Stop discrimination against adults with a learning disability.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adults with a learning disability, in the care of social services, are not given the same financial input as children in main stream education, with regard to their continuing educational needs. From the age of eighteen they are discriminated against, by lack of staff and resources, to help create meaningful supported work opportunities. Services are not coordinated in an efficient way.
